title: Germany CPI Housing & Utilities
description: CPI Housing Utilities in Germany increased to 124.20 points in October from 122 points in September of 2022. CPI Housing Utilities in Germany averaged 86.56 points from 1991 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 124.20 points in October of 2022 and a record low of 53.30 points in March of 1991. In Germany, the most important category in the consumer price index is Housing, water, electricity, gas & other fuels (32 percent of the total weight). This page provides - Germany  Cpi Housing & Utilities- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Federal Statistical Office
